html:
Lord said. After Isaiah dramatized the prophecy, the Lord spoke again and explained its meaning.

sign and wonder. This word pair often expresses a great sign from God (Deut. 28:46; 3 Ne. 2:1; Hel. 14:6). Here, Isaiah's action symbolizes the great sign from God that prophesied the captivity of Egypt and Ethiopia.

Ethiopia. Ethiopia is located below Egypt and is part of the kingdom of Nubia that was settled by the descendants of Cush (Gen. 10:6).
